articles.title: European elections 2024: 11 important things to watch for - BBC.com
articles.description: BBC correspondents across Europe assess the national mood ahead of European Parliament elections.
articles.content:
When Europeans vote in elections for the European Parliament this coming week, their choices will reflect the national mood in 27 different countries.
